system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: POS terminals unable to process transactions.

conversation_history.message: Our point of sale terminals are unable to process transactions since this morning. Customers are being turned away. Please help urgently!
Thank you for reaching out, John. I understand the urgency of this issue. Let me investigate right away. Can you confirm if all terminals are affected or just a subset?
All terminals are affected. None of them can process payments or access the backend system.
Understood. I’ve identified a critical issue with our backend APIs. They appear to be unresponsive due to a misconfiguration in the Azure App Service. I’m escalating this to our engineering team now.
Thank you. Please keep me updated. This is causing major disruptions for our business.
The engineering team has deployed a fix to the misconfigured App Service. Can you try processing a transaction now and confirm if the issue is resolved?
I just tested it, and it’s working now. Transactions are being processed correctly again. Thank you for the quick resolution.
You’re welcome, John. I’m glad we could resolve this quickly. Please let us know if you encounter any other issues.

resolution: The Azure App Service hosting the backend APIs was misconfigured, causing them to become unresponsive. The configuration was corrected, restoring functionality.
root_cause: A recent update to the Azure App Service configuration inadvertently disabled critical API endpoints required for point of sale transactions.
